about_the_game:
Third person slasher


Mob Hunter is an unusual third-person slasher with a unique combat system, classes and a lot of cool MONSTERS! In this game you will hunt big sinister monsters and carry out orders to kill very dangerous creatures. Equip your hero with powerful weapons and go hunting to win the war!

You have to play as three different hunters, visit the locations of four kingdoms, fight more than twenty unique monsters, defeat four strongest bosses and get to know the world and its inhabitants.

Order Z


Monsters are gathering in heaps on the border of 4 kingdoms!
Quickly take on the role of a new evil hunter, who is on a magic circuit at the "transformer" in the ancient order of Z. Find out the reason for the strange behavior of monsters by hacking your way to the truth!

NPC


The hunter will get acquainted with the various inhabitants of this world, who will help the hunter in his difficult journey. Turn collected monster hearts into hunter upgrades, unlock new abilities, customize and tell interesting stories about the world.
But in order to free all the characters, the hunter will have to pass serious tests!

Orders


Monsters terrorize the territories of 4 kingdoms. Take an order for a dangerous monster and go to battle!
Slicing your way through ever-changing locations, the hunter will have to face various bosses, win a harsh victory and get rid of the chains!
